mapper.sql: a.ID as "id" , a.RY_ID as "ryId" , a.XM as "xm" , a.ZGBH as "zgbh" , a.TX_YF as "txYf" , a.TX_MF as "txMf" , a.TX_JB as "txJb" , a.LTX_JE as "ltxJe" , a.LTXBT_JE as "ltxbtJe" , a.REMARKS as "remarks" , a.ENABLE_FLAG as "enableFlag" , a.DEL_FLAG as "delFlag" , a.CREATE_BY as "createBy" , a.CREATE_DATE as "createDate" , a.UPDATE_BY as "updateBy" , a.UPDATE_DATE as "updateDate"
mapper.select:
SELECT count(1) FROM t_dp_txxx a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_dp_txxx( ID , RY_ID , XM , ZGBH , TX_YF , TX_MF , TX_JB , LTX_JE , LTXBT_JE , REMARKS , ENABLE_FLAG , DEL_FLAG , CREATE_BY , CREATE_DATE , UPDATE_BY , UPDATE_DATE ) values( #{id} , #{ryId} , #{xm} , #{zgbh} , #{txYf} , #{txMf} , #{txJb} , #{ltxJe} , #{ltxbtJe} , #{remarks} , #{enableFlag} , #{delFlag} , #{createBy} , #{createDate} , #{updateBy} , #{updateDate} )
